name: Ninh Quyen
title: Senior Software Developer
summary: Results-driven Senior Web Developer with over 10 years of expertise in front-end development and modern web technologies. Demonstrated track record of delivering high-quality solutions across diverse sectors including social networks, data management systems, and travel platforms. shortSummary: Senior Web Developer with 10+ years of expertise in front-end development. Proven track record in delivering high-quality solutions using Angular and React.
